text: Is there a way to know if the page is under a cookie policy? I would like to conditionally display the 'cookie settings' button. Right now its always in the footer but it does nothing if there's no cookie policy, so it's misleading.

I have a module with a text field to be able to append a string to a file name…
`{% if module.append_string %}`
   `{% set pre_extension_filename = pre_extension_filename ~ module.append_string %}`
`{% endif %}`
but when I use it to change the name I get the “missing asset” error… I checked that the final file name is correct, and the file is indeed there. Any thoughts on where this error could be coming from?

The string gets the extension added back and then the path is called using
`{{ module_asset_url(final_string) }}`
